DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim study develop test psychodynamic Internet-delivered psychological treatment patient major depression and/or anxiety disorder compare efficacy active control group .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-delivered Psychodynamic Therapy Depression Anxiety Disorders
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder , Panic Disorder , Social Anxiety Disorder , Generalized Anxiety disorder , Depressive Disorder NOS Anxiety Disorder NOS 10 high PHQ9 GAD7 pretreatment Primary diagnosis Obsessive Compulsive Disorder Posttraumatic Stress Disorder Severe psychiatric condition ( e.g . psychosis bipolar disorder ) Alcohol abuse ( 16 AUDIT ) Suicidal ( measure diagnostic interview ) Changed medication last three month
